functionset.description: Functionset to create a PDF from a webpage.

function.name: xml2pdf
function.description: Creates an attachments node containing a PDF from a xml.

param.name: xml
param.description: The xml or xhtml use, has to be a complete url

param.name: xsl
param.description: A xhtml2pdf XSL (FO) file to transform the xhtml to fo which FOP can use (has to live in MMBase its config/xsl directory).

param.name: title
param.description: Title of the resulting attachments node
